resources.string: This App uses the Barcode Scanner App by zxing to scan Barcodes. Find out more on http://code.google.com/p/zxing/
Export by copying csv to clipboard
The free Barcode Scanner App by zxing is required to scan Barcodes. You can install it from Android Market or download the latest apk from their website.
Do you really want to delete this article?
After saving a new article all fields will be automatically cleared and a new scan will be triggered
After saving a new article you will have to clear all fields by hand and trigger scanning with the button
Do you really want to delete the entire database? This cannot be made undone.
There are no articles to display. Go and scan some!

This app was developed by Ansgar Mertens (see http://www.c-labs-android.de)
